messages.content:
You are an expert London family-activities curator.

Return ONLY a valid JSON object. No markdown, no explanations.

CRITICAL MATCH CHECK:
- Strictly compare scraped pages to raw name, tags, schedules, AND descriptions.
- If ANY core mismatch exists, set "contentMatchesDescription": false and return ONLY { "contentMatchesDescription": false }.
- If NONE of the pages describe "Shrek's Adventure", set "contentMatchesDescription": false.

OUTPUT SPECIFICATION (only when contentMatchesDescription === true):
- "summary": string, 25–45 words — exciting, family-focused, enticing!
- "officialAgeAvailable": boolean (true only if site explicitly states age guidance like "suitable for ages 5–12")
- "minAge" / "maxAge": integers 0–18
  → If officialAgeAvailable === true → use the exact numbers stated.
  → If officialAgeAvailable === false → give your best RECOMMENDED realistic age range for this activity (do NOT use 0–18).
- "keywords": array of 32–50 lowercase single words (give plenty, we’ll trim to ≤30).
- "labels": exactly 3 short labels, e.g. ["indoor", "theatre", "christmas"].

Raw event descriptions (MUST compare to scraped pages for match):
Type: default
Description: A magical adventure land with a flying bus, fortune tellers, the Mirror Maze of Insanity and much more. Meet everyone's favourite ogre and spend a special day out with lots of fun.

Activity name: Shrek's Adventure

Tags: activities, days out, kids, theatre

You are receiving the TOP 3 MOST RELEVANT pages from the official website (already ranked by relevance).

Each page contains both the full text (first 4000 chars) AND focused extracted sections (hours, age, price, description).

Synthesise information ACROSS ALL pages. Prioritise the extracted sections when they exist.

If NONE of the pages describe the activity "Shrek's Adventure", set "contentMatchesDescription": false. Otherwise it MUST be true.

Privacy Preference Center
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
More information
Allow All
Manage Consent Preferences
Strictly Necessary Cookies
Always Active
These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Performance Cookies
Performance Cookies
These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
Functional Cookies
Functional Cookies
These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
Targeting Cookies
Targeting Cookies
These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
Performance Cookies

=== Page 2 – Frequently asked questions | Shrek's Adventure! London (https://www.shreksadventure.com/plan-your-visit/information/faqs/) ===
Extracted key sections (use these first):
AGE → suitable for children?
During your adventure you’ll meet many characters (princesses and donkeys included), but as in all fairytales you may also encounter a witch or two, which some of our younger audience may find scary! Whilst there’s no age limit, we recommend Shrek's Adventure! London for children aged 6-12 (and for those younger knights and princesses feeling especially brave).

PRICE → children?
During your adventure you’ll meet many characters (princesses and donkeys included), but as in all fairytales you may also encounter a witch or two, which some of our younger audience may find scary! Whilst there’s no age limit, we recommend Shrek's Adventure! London for children aged 6-12 (and for those younger knights and princesses feeling especially brave).
Are there any age restrictions?
Shrek’s Adventure is suitable for all ages, and children under the age of 2 enjoy free entry*. Howe

DESCRIPTION → experience
Is Shrek's Adventure suitable for children?
During your adventure you’ll meet many characters (princesses and donkeys included), but as in all fairytales you may also encounter a witch or two, which some of our younger audience may find scary! Whilst there’s no age limit, we recommend Shrek's Adventure! London for children aged 6-12 (and for those younger knights and princesses feeling especially brave).
Are there any age restrictions?
Shrek’s Adventure is suitable for all ages, and children under the age of 2 enjoy free entry*. However, the recommended age is 6 and above.
Children 15 and under must be accompanied by an adult aged 18 years or over.
Please note that all tickets are non-refundable, so be sure before purchasing. For detailed terms and conditions, click the provided link.
*Effective from 20 July 2023 onwards, children under 2 will enjoy free entry. This replaces previous policies.
How long will my visit last?
Tours last approximately 1 hour excluding any additional queuing times. There is an interactive area at the end of the tour where you can meet your favourite friends from other DreamWorks worlds like Kung Fu Panda and How to Train Your Dragon; you may spend as lo

Full page text (first 4000 chars):
Read on for everything you need to know about your trip to Shrek's Adventure! London.
Planning a visit to Shrek's Adventure London? Read our frequently asked questions here.
Read on for everything you need to know about your trip to Shrek's Adventure! London.
Skip to main content
FAQs
Your heroic quest for answers ends here!
Read on for everything you need to know about your trip to Shrek's Adventure! London.
The experience
Is Shrek's Adventure suitable for children?
During your adventure you’ll meet many characters (princesses and donkeys included), but as in all fairytales you may also encounter a witch or two, which some of our younger audience may find scary! Whilst there’s no age limit, we recommend Shrek's Adventure! London for children aged 6-12 (and for those younger knights and princesses feeling especially brave).
Are there any age restrictions?
Shrek’s Adventure is suitable for all ages, and children under the age of 2 enjoy free entry*. However, the recommended age is 6 and above.
Children 15 and under must be accompanied by an adult aged 18 years or over.
Please note that all tickets are non-refundable, so be sure before purchasing. For detailed terms and conditions, click the provided link.
*Effective from 20 July 2023 onwards, children under 2 will enjoy free entry. This replaces previous policies.
How long will my visit last?
Tours last approximately 1 hour excluding any additional queuing times. There is an interactive area at the end of the tour where you can meet your favourite friends from other DreamWorks worlds like Kung Fu Panda and How to Train Your Dragon; you may spend as long as you want in this area. The time on your ticket is the time you are allowed to enter the building and queue. Queue times differ depending on attendance levels and can go from 10-30 minutes.
What do I do if I want to leave the attraction?
If at any time you need to leave the attraction, simply speak to the actor in the show you are in and they will arrange for someone to help you to the nearest exit as soon as possible.
What can I expect?
Shrek's Adventure! London is an immersive, walkthrough experience where a whole cast of your favourite Shrek characters brings the story to life around you.
I don't speak English, can I still visit?
The tours are run only in English to cater to the vast majority of international visitors. Many non-English speakers still enjoy the sensory nature of our tours but may not experience the attraction in the same way as those proficient in English. Unfortunately, audio guides are not available at this time
Is it scary?
There are some moments of mild peril which some younger guests may find scary. Please see our Sensory Journey for information on each space and some of the elements you may see in each area.
I'm pregnant, can I still attend?
Pregnant people are welcome at Shrek's Adventure! London but please be aware this is a mostly standing or walking experience with little chance to sit down.
Can I take photos when on the tour?
Photography is not permitted at any time whilst on the main tour. You can take photos in our admission area and at the end of the tour.
Are there any restrictions for the Magic Bus?
The magic bus includes water sprays, air blasts, fog and aromas. You should not experience this section of the tour if you suffer from any disorder or condition that may be affected by any of the above.
The bus is not suitable for guests who suffer from the conditions below;
Epilepsy
Motion sickness
Asthma
Any other chronic illness
The bus is accessible to wheelchair users who are able to transfer up one step, into the seat and have the ability to sit upright.
Can I vape or smoke at Shrek's Adventure! London?
At Shrek's Adventure! London, smoking or vaping is not permitted. Visitors cannot smoke, use e-cigarettes or vaping products anywhere in the attraction.
Before you book
What are your opening hours?
Opening times vary. Please see full opening times here.
Is there a minimum age?
We recommend 6-

=== Page 3 – Facilities | Shrek's Adventure! London (https://www.shreksadventure.com/plan-your-visit/information/facilities/) ===
Extracted key sections (use these first):
AGE → age Consent Preferences
Strictly Necessary Cookies
Always Active
These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cooki

DESCRIPTION → experience. Look out for our customer feedback survey point too!
Southbank area
Cashpoint / ATM
The closest cashpoints to the Shrek's Adventure! London are on Chicheley Street (by the Slug and Lettuce entrance) and in St. Thomas’ Hospital.
Bureau De Change
There is a Bureau De Change located in London Waterloo station. There is also a MONEY CORP ATM which accepts international cards and dispenses in foreign/domestic currency. This is located by the taxi rank.
Restaurants and Eating
The South Bank affords you many different dining options, by walking just a few yards from Shrek's Adventure! London you will find:
Gillrays at the Marriott Hotel County Hall
Locale on Belvedere Road
Skylon, Royal Festival Hall
Pizza Express, Belvedere Road
Wagamama, Royal Festival Hall
Giraffe, Royal Festival Hall
Brasserie Joël, Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London
Coffee Shops
The closest coffee shop to Shrek's Adventure! London is Starbucks, located on Belvedere Rd.  Or, head to espressamente illy coffee bar on Westminster Bridge Road which serves the finest quality Italian coffee and snacks.
Public Phones
There are two public phones in the area one at the bottom of the London Eye landscape and the other at th

Full page text (first 4000 chars):
To help you plan and make the most of your visit to Shrek's Adventure! London we have made a Shrektastic list of all our facilities at Shrek's Adventure! London and the amenities of the surrounding Southbank area.
Find out more about the facilities available to guests at Shrek's Adventure! London and its area Southbank.
To help you plan and make the most of your visit to Shrek's Adventure! London we have made a Shrektastic list of all our facilities at Shrek's Adventure! London and the amenities of the surrounding Southbank area.
Skip to main content
Facilities
Facilities
To help you plan and make the most of your visit to Shrek's Adventure! London we have made a Shrektastic list of all our facilities at Shrek's Adventure! London and the amenities of the surrounding Southbank area.
Shrek's Adventure! London
Wi-Fi
Shrek's Adventure has full Wi-Fi access
Toilets
The toilets are located on the first floor before the start of the tour.  We suggest you use them before your tour starts so you don’t have to miss anything later on.
Photography
There will be opportunity to have your photograph taken before your tour starts so practise your ogre sized smiles and saying ‘snot-balls’ for the camera
First Aid
If you require first-aid assistance during your visit please approach a member of staff. We are located 5 minutes from St. Thomas’ hospital A&E department.
Gift Shop
Shrek's Adventure! London gift shop is located at the attraction, selling souvenirs and mementos of your experience. Look out for our customer feedback survey point too!
Southbank area
Cashpoint / ATM
The closest cashpoints to the Shrek's Adventure! London are on Chicheley Street (by the Slug and Lettuce entrance) and in St. Thomas’ Hospital.
Bureau De Change
There is a Bureau De Change located in London Waterloo station. There is also a MONEY CORP ATM which accepts international cards and dispenses in foreign/domestic currency. This is located by the taxi rank.
Restaurants and Eating
The South Bank affords you many different dining options, by walking just a few yards from Shrek's Adventure! London you will find:
Gillrays at the Marriott Hotel County Hall
Locale on Belvedere Road
Skylon, Royal Festival Hall
Pizza Express, Belvedere Road
Wagamama, Royal Festival Hall
Giraffe, Royal Festival Hall
Brasserie Joël, Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London
Coffee Shops
The closest coffee shop to Shrek's Adventure! London is Starbucks, located on Belvedere Rd.  Or, head to espressamente illy coffee bar on Westminster Bridge Road which serves the finest quality Italian coffee and snacks.
Public Phones
There are two public phones in the area one at the bottom of the London Eye landscape and the other at the entry to the Marriott County Hall hotel.
Hotels
The Marriott Hotel County Hall, Park Plaza County Hall London, Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London and Premier Inn County Hall are our closest hotels.
Park Plaza County Hall London & Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London
A perfect base to start your visit in the world’s greatest city… Park Plaza Hotels offer spacious accommodation options and are ideally located just south of Westminster Bridge overlooking the River Thames, within walking distance of many of London’s most famous attractions including the London Eye, Big Ben, the Houses of Parliament, SEA LIFE London Aquarium, National Theatre and the Southbank Centre and of course Shrek's Adventure! London. The hotels are situated minutes away from Waterloo National Rail and Underground Station – providing connections to the Jubilee, Northern, Waterloo & City and Bakerloo tube lines as well as mainline rail to the South of England.
Park Plaza County Hall London, 1 Addington Street, London, SE1 7RY
Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London, 200 Westminster Bridge Road, London, SE1 7UT
For the best accommodation rates, book online at https://www.radissonhotels.com/en-us/hotels/park-plaza-county-hall-london and https://www.radissonhotels.com/en-us/hotels/park-plaza-westminster-bridge-london
